articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft Lists is a new app designed for Teams, SharePoint, and Outlook - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft Lists is a new web and mobile app designed to replace SharePoint Lists. It’s for businesses who use Microsoft 365 to create lists for tracking items internally. Microsoft is planning to start rolling out Lists this summer.
articles.content: The future of SharePoint Lists arrives this summer
